headline: Textron (TXT): Assessing Valuation After a Steady 1-Year Share Price Gain
summary: Textron (TXT) has been quietly grinding higher, and its recent 1 year gain of roughly 15% is catching more investor attention. With aviation, defense, and industrial exposure, the stock invites a closer look. See our latest analysis for Textron. That steady climb has not been in a straight line, with a recent pullback from the 1 week share price return contrasting with a solid 1 month share price gain and a healthy 1 year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum is still broadly...
